location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Draft letter from Lewis Pelly, Windham Club, St James's Square, London to Captain Evelyn Baring

mods.abstract: Draft of a letter regarding the possibility of Pelly returning early to India so that Aitchison can take his leave as there are concerns over Aitchison's health and also so that Pelly can be there for the Prince of Wales (later Edward VII) visit.The draft letter contains numerous crossings through and corrections.
